name: DROP
title: drop.space
shortDescription: DROP is a simple file sharing platform designed for individuals and businesses needing to send large files up to 10GB quickly and securely. Ideal for graphic designers, video editors, and other professionals who regularly share large media files, DROP simplifies the process without the need for complex setups. Users can drag and drop files onto the platform and share them via a link, making it accessible even to those with minimal technical knowledge.
pros: No account required for basic use
